extDescription.message: Automatically hides tab groups when you switch away from them.

commandNextTab.message: Focus the right tab, even if it's in a collapsed group.

commandPreviousTab.message: Focus the left tab, even if it's in a collapsed group.

commandMoveTabRight.message: Move tab right. Might merge into the next group.

commandMoveTabLeft.message: Move tab left. Might merge into the previous group.

commandSendTabToRightGroup.message: Send the current tab to the right tab group.

commandSendTabToLeftGroup.message: Send the current tab to the left tab group.

commandToggleAutoHide.message: Toggle auto-hide state of the current tab group.
